website_summaries.verdict: A favorite for sparring practice, with good reason: It combines well-padded, full face protection with good visibility.
pros: Well padded, offering good protection from strikes and reducing the chance of getting rocked
Headgear doesn’t slip when face gets sweaty
cons: Comes in one size only (though it does have multiple adjustment points)
A lower-end option, its synthetic cover doesn’t hold up as well as leather

customer_reviews.title: A bit large but more pros than cons!
customer_reviews.text: Some pros and cons, but ultimately 5-stars. Pros: -Fantastic coverage -Visibility is really good (I was worried the peripherals would be cut off more than my last helmet) -Comfortable -Adjustable -Good quality -Breathable Cons: -A bit big (though the helmet is adjustable, I find myself having to pull as hard as I can to make the velcro as tight as I can, as the helmet moves a lot with head contact). I'm a petite woman, so this might not be an issue for others, but it's not a huge issue as long as you make it really tight)
customer_reviews.author: Nicoleta

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My son has Tourettes and can sometimes have tics that involve hitting his head or hitting his head into things. While it doesn’t protect my refrigerator it does protect his head and that is all that matters. It is well made and comfortable and offers him the protection he needs even if it isn’t being used for the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gold-Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very good piece of headgear.
customer_reviews.text: A very good head gear for mid/hard sparring. I use it almost every other day on kickboxing and I can totally recommend it. I'm a 5'11 200 lbs guy and I spar with people of my size/weight and I really can assure you that this would reduce greatly the impact of punches and kicks.
customer_reviews.author: dubbios

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEADGEAR EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for practice and amateur competitions. It protects very well the head while still allowing it to breath. It also does not hinder sight whatsoever, so that's great! I have a smallish head, and I was worried when I bought it that it would be too big. However, the 2-way Velcro ensures a perfect fit for your head no matter the size. Overall, this is an amazing product, and is cheap for what it is!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding function, fit and style
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? The header says it all. While this headgear uses a lower-quality cover material than the high-end sparring gear (that Venum ALSO offers), it's comfortable and highly durable. The fit for the average cranium is nice and tight without being suffocating, and it looks many times better than the typical foam gear you see in your local dojo. Would recommend to anyone wanting some serious sparring gear on a budget. Also, Carlos Condit wears Venum. What else do I have to say?
customer_reviews.author: Nate Francis

customer_reviews.title: Best headgear I have owned so far covers most of ...
customer_reviews.text: Best headgear I have owned so far covers most of my face but still leaves me with great vision. It fits snug around my whole head but still very comfortable. Will never spar with any other headgear after wearing this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner headgear for sparring
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cost for value product. While not the top of the line, for the cost it is fantastic. I recommend this product for beginners that need a bit more cushioning than the other venum headgear products.
customer_reviews.author: Niz

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for sparring a couple of times now and it seems to work well. The headgear is a bit long for my face, so I don't feel like the chin is either too low or the forehead padding too high. However, the adjustable velcro allows for a snug fit that doesn't move during a round. I haven't noticed much reduction in visibility from sparring without headgear. Pretty comfortable and not too hot. It seems like it will cushion the blows, but I haven't done any heavy sparring in it yet, but will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna J Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Top Quailty Boxing Gear
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as expected from Venum. Have not been disappointed with any purchase from this brand. Headgear has held up under hard training. Great headgear
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff from China
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed that I received a cheap knockoff from China. I had high hopes for this headgear due to the high reviews on it but unfortunately I received the cheap knock off version from China. The stitching was extremely poor quality and the stitching was also crooked. The headgear did not fit right the second I put it on and was crooked on my head. The tag said “designed in Thailand “ And also said made in China. I am sending these back for a refund and will be looking elsewhere to buy a new headgear. Beware of knock offs!
customer_reviews.author: Summer M

customer_reviews.title: To Big
customer_reviews.text: This is very large headgear. I have around an average sized head, yet the chin is loose a few inches. Unless you are very big, I wouldn't recommend this headgear.
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't block your view
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with this head gear. My only complaint is the front padding near the nose is stiched crooked. One side is up higher than the other so it brushes against my nose. Doesn't affect functionally.
customer_reviews.author: TMPB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Shoddy craftmanship and assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Shoddy uneven padding. Mouth area opening is asymmetrical and badly assembled. Cheek area is also uneven . One side is higher than the other. Inside cheek padding is thick on one side and thin on the other. Use of this headgear could get you hurt.
customer_reviews.author: 51LV3RF0X

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I've been sparring in this a good bit and I find it to provide good support. It fits me well. It doesn't slide around and it offers support for the hits. I'm a fan of the Venum products and this one is no different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used for kickboxingtraining. Lightweight and quite comfortable. It's never comfortable ofcourse, but it's ok. Have to take it off after each match.
customer_reviews.author: Bli

customer_reviews.title: Decent Headgear
customer_reviews.text: This headgear is good, not great. For the price, it is decent. I wear a medium in Twins and Ringside. The fit is good, and the overall quality is good. I use this as my backup headgear when I want to let my Twins headgear dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and universal fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product for my training needs. The universal fit removes any sizing concerns that I had prior to ordering. In fact, IMO, this justified the little extra costs for it over other full head gear. The padding is really nice and keeps me from getting my bell rung to badly. :)
customer_reviews.author: EMS

customer_reviews.title: Great head gear> use it for light sparring and getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Great head gear> use it for light sparring and getting a good workout. Took a bunch of shots from my trainer and aside from looking silly, the only thing that was hurt was my pride. I do have a larger head so the head gear is tight. But that works to my favor because it does not move around. Much better than the Warrior headgear my son purchased at the same time. His moves around alot after taking punches and he has to stop and adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Montanez

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: MY friend had bought cheap gear and regrets it after putting this one on! DONT BUY CHEAP HEADGEAR! Definitely cushions a lot of the impact!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap everlast one before this. This one is really lightweight and protects great!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great fit, quality, and about 80% facial coverage. would highly recommend for pretty boy fighters
customer_reviews.author: IG @Zayd_on_Marz

customer_reviews.title: ... doesn't stay firmly on your head other than that good headgear for a
customer_reviews.text: No chin strap so it doesn't stay firmly on your head other than that good headgear for a beginner
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mills

customer_reviews.title: Big head
customer_reviews.text: Other headgear don't really work with larger heads, and I was skeptical of the one-size-fits-all of this one, but it actually fits like a glove. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Muay Thai
customer_reviews.text: Useful for martial arts classes. Does a great job protecting ears.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer  757

customer_reviews.title: Protecting his hard head...
customer_reviews.text: Stubborn bf likes it AND uses it. Fast shipping, item as described. Happy with purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Even-though it's one size fit all, It fit my head perfectly. It also look really good physically. My normal hat size is 7 & 1-8 for your reference.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headgear - couldn’t ask for better in terms of vision, strike absorption and comfort. A lot of headgear I’ve tried has felt bulky or reduced my vision too much. This headgear is the happy medium I’ve been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for light sparring
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for full contact sparring with 14 or 16oz gloves and have been very happy with it. The velcro closure allows for a lot of adjustment. The lining doesn't slide and is comfortable without getting too funky smelling. My only complaint is the chin cup is a little shallow and took a while to break in to my face.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schupska

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Good quality, comfortable, but doesn't protect the nose. Good for light sparring. I got this for my 10 year old son which started boxing. If your kid plans on competing in boxing, make sure to get the proper competition headgear. Otherwise you will be purchasing two headgears. The only bad thing was that it took a lot longer than the estimated delivery time to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Blue78

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your time.
customer_reviews.text: Does not sit correctly. The forefmhead pad is way too high. Therefore, does not cover where needed. Bought for boxing. My trainer said no way for sparring.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I can't say it's too bad but is not as good as there gloves are.
customer_reviews.author: Zhivko Kanazirski

customer_reviews.title: tight!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a good headgear, it's just super tight on my face! I don't know if my face it too big?
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: I like this head gear
customer_reviews.text: I like this head gear... it does a good job of protecting your face (although your nose is somewhat exposed). Sweat doesn't drip into my eyes with the Venum like my last headgear did.... It's lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: StephAnd

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well made! Fast delivery! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It’s really useful!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good item. I had someone punch and and it really reduced the damage!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: She's a tough one.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my girlfriends head perfectly.haha can't wait to beat her up now.
customer_reviews.author: Frank18757

customer_reviews.title: Lets you take hits to the face
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for sparring. I get hit in the face repeatedly because I'm a slow learner. It works fantastic. No bruises! 😁
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking product and fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the package on time for one. Two the quality is pretty good. I put the head gear on I was worried it wouldn't fit me but is adjustable with three Velcro straps and fit perfect. I can't wait to get in the gym and spar.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the right color headgear
customer_reviews.text: So I got the right kind of head gear but I didn’t get the all black I got the white and black. The reason I wanted all black was because it would match with everything. So that’s kind of a downer but other than that it’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sparring gear
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sparring gear. Great quality, great durability, great fit. I use to have the hot dipped foam stuff - which made me extremely hot, and caused my to sweat. This gear keeps me cooler, and I suspect will be more durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McMann

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This headgear works great for my 11 yeaqr old.
customer_reviews.author: D. Montes

customer_reviews.title: Great head, cheek
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! Great head, cheek, jaw and ear protection. Great quality product with amazing performance!! Highly recommend for all skilled fighters.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Nichols

customer_reviews.title: ... this headgear for my son and it fits him great. The back has a velcro closure so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headgear for my son and it fits him great. The back has a velcro closure so it can be somewhat adjust to fit your head properly. Highly recommended. Plus it looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product a bit tight for me but it is perfectly fine for your money it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Venum Headgear
customer_reviews.text: I've never ordered MMA Gear online because I like to try everything on before I buy it since for the most part, all MMA gear is expensive. When I received this headgear, I was more than pleased with it. The quality and fit are amazing! It also came in about a week and a half which was cool!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No bruises or bumps yet to the head so 5 stars. Unfortunately, I take a lot of hits too...
customer_reviews.author: PYoonit

customer_reviews.title: this is pretty rad headgear
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is pretty rad headgear. Fits great, looks great, protects well. However, for my purposes, it doesn't proved as much protection for your nose. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: It was good more colors would be nice
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it fitted good and was comfortable and I disliked that it was made in China not Thailand where it said it was design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and protective
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and protective. Breathes fairly well, too. An excellent compromise of padding and field-of-vision.
customer_reviews.author: SA7

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and protective
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and protective. Breathes fairly well, too. An excellent compromise of padding and field-of-vision.
customer_reviews.author: SA7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its just what I needed. Since the fit is adjustable, there is none of the spinning headgear thing when you get hit. I like it. It looks nice and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wortham

customer_reviews.title: Great Headgear
customer_reviews.text: Used it to Spar the other at boxing practice and it worked well. Worth the money to protect your noggin!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Daniel Kester

customer_reviews.title: Great head the one size fits most is great but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great head the one size fits most is great but if you think you have a big head don't get it. I have average size head and it is a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not permitted design in UK fight
customer_reviews.text: My son couldn’t use this for his kick boxing fight in the UK recently as it was “illegal” due to the cheek protection parts. Shame
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable fit, absorbs hits really nice and doesn't get moved around too much.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my sparring gear
customer_reviews.text: Slightly lower cheek protection improves range of vision. Easy on and off. Comfortable but a bit warm.
customer_reviews.author: SRL

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This fits great and has a lot of padding. Great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defected
customer_reviews.text: Everything’s good but it looks a bit defected In a couple areas
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great fitting headgear. Comfortable with a big view, plenty of protection!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear for kickboxing
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Protects great. Allows good visibility. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable for many head shapes and sizes.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has started Brazilian jujitsu and MMA and we needed head gear that would protect his head and face. This helmet is fantastic. it adjusts both vertically and horizontally in the back to fit. It fits my head, my son's and my 6 year old scrawny daughter. It has worked well when he is sparring and does a good job protecting not only his head, but his cheeks and chin too. Because it is so adjustable, I hope that this is the only one we need to buy for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E. Schaad

customer_reviews.title: Really great head gear all around
customer_reviews.text: Really great head gear all around. Been doing Muay Thai with it for a bit and love it. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Isai Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This headgear fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I do Sanshou kickboxing so I bought this headgear with the bundle. So far everything I got in the bundle been holding up great. This headgear fits great, fees great, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Fit and Wear
customer_reviews.text: Super adjustable and comfy. Doesn't impede my peripheral vision. I'm a 5'4" female nak muay. Wish it had more padding for the back of my head, but I sure watch for those head kicks a lot more now.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time the other day and I love it. Fits perfectly and all the extra padding is a lifesaver. I got hit pretty hard in the forehead area and I barely felt it. No issues with visibility, only negative is the nose area. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Fits very well and I'm using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Fits very well and I'm using it very often when I sparred.
customer_reviews.author: Chew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought was exactly what I was hoping for. The headgear looks and fits great on my head, has great vision while still protecting my face well, it also doesn't slip when caught with a good shot. The shin guards have great padding, look pretty cool, and stay on when grappling.
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: They look great and does not disrupt my vision at all
customer_reviews.text: This was my first headgear and it will probably be the only headgear I get. They look great and does not disrupt my vision at all.
customer_reviews.author: TyloPolo

customer_reviews.title: The product description claims that the item is "Handmade in ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description claims that the item is "Handmade in Thailand". However, the item I received simply says "Designed in Thailand", but Made in China. Also, the item description on Amazon shows the material as Skintex leather. The item I received is made from synthetic leather. I suspect that the item shown in the pictures is the real Venum, but the item that I received is a cheap Chinese knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Philydrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for sparring
customer_reviews.text: Great for sparring. Very comfortable to wear and easy on and off. That helps in kick boxing class. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality headgear
customer_reviews.text: Hight quality, excellent protection and comfortable! The visibility is great and it is light :D
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good headgear. In the description, it is made in thailand. It is not. It is made in china.
customer_reviews.author: samuel jeon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. However one size fits all is too big!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection for the present skill level of our guys. Provides our guys with more confidence when sparring. Highly recommend for beginner to mid level skill range.
customer_reviews.author: John Nauka

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable . Just not boxing stamped . Can't use it for real boxing matches . But it's great for sparring . Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: savvas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headgear!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in headgear for MMA sparring, and it is amazing. The fit is perfect and the padding is extremely comfortable. My last headgear was leaving my ears sore from lack of padding. This headgear does an excellent job protecting the ears ad stays perfectly in place while working on wrestling and jiu jitsu.
customer_reviews.author: subiedave

customer_reviews.title: Solid but not the best, great value though
customer_reviews.text: Perception is pretty good but not great. For the price it is solid headgear for heavy sparring, however the Velcro gets really annoying as soon as it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blueeye
customer_reviews.text: Good headgear it fits most sizes but if you are serious about boxing try brands like rival, reyes, everlast, ringside or the best brand Winning from Japan
customer_reviews.author: Eric Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headgear for my 13yo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headgear for my 13yo. Good protection, easily adjustable for snug fit. Should be the last one he ever needs.
customer_reviews.author: Keith oba

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the service and speed of the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the service and speed of the delivery. The quality is also great. The only issue I have is it is slightly itchy when wearing it for long periods of time but that is to be expected from new gear of this type
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description!
customer_reviews.text: Not made in Thailand and uses PU leather instead of skintex. They need to change the description. I'm giving it 2 stars because although it feels cheap, Venum did respond to my question about the differing materials and country of origin. They changed manufacturers at some point. I bought this along with other items to go with it on prime day and now the colors probably won't match the way I wanted. Need to find new head gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniannn

customer_reviews.title: keep your kids safe!  Research headgear carefully
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Varsity wrestler. He did lots of research and settled on this headgear. turns out it was a great decision. Even though price is the least of my worries when choosing something that will protect my son, the price was pretty decent! He finds the Venum Challenger comfortable, protective and is very pleased with his choice. I am too!
customer_reviews.author: Susana Rylander

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect. Good impact absorption
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Good impact absorption. Very good visibility. Only complain I got is the inside low quality materials; it feel kinda unconformable on the cheeks, I would suggest putting some vaseline on face, before sparring.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first headgear so I don't have much to compare to but so far so good. I always hated the ones that are available for free in my gym, these offer more protection without too many cons.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. better than the Everlast or UFC headgear you find in sporting goods stores. Highly recommended gear.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smoot

customer_reviews.title: I was able to find statistical analysis on any of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to find statistical analysis on any of the researched headgear but my son loves it - thus the 5 rating. For me, I just hopeful the protection is adequate enough to protect his adolescent brain.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: What r u waiting for... buy it dammit!!!
customer_reviews.text: You should get this if you are considering buying just do it dont waste money on cheap headgear!!! Your head is the most valuable target when sparring dont get anything less than the best. Im just being honest ive had cheaper headgear (12$ one from china) and it does the job but this perfectly protects your head soft and absorbant durable what else can i say all around great product!!!!!! 6/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Matt V.

customer_reviews.title: PHENOMINAL.
customer_reviews.text: PHENOMINAL. YOU DONT HAVE TO CONSTANTLY ADJUST IT. GREAT PAD PROTECTION ESPCEIALLY THE JAW/CHIN AREA. EXCELLENT PADDING.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good head gear
customer_reviews.text: Great protection and vision. I would certainly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight and protects pretty good... i highly recommend this head gear
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Bucasas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It protects my face very well especially my mouth. It won't bother my sight. Pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Atsuhisa c/I Eileen Pokorny

customer_reviews.title: Four stars because I haven't sparred with this headgear yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because I haven't sparred with this headgear yet. The construction and fit are top notch, and I think it'll be very durable. I'll update after sparring with it.
customer_reviews.author: MathNerd

customer_reviews.title: Personal Feel
customer_reviews.text: I have started to use this for sparring at my boxing class and it feels really comfortable and lightweight, the only thing is that it doesn't protect your nose as you wanted too, the gloves does have contact with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yesica Rivera

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement. This product is not a full face ...
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement. This product is not a full face head gear. It notes that there is chin protection and you can see it in the picture but there is only a thin strap on the headgear I received. Now I can't use it for sparring at my martial arts school because it doesn't fulfill the requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P David

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the headgear to feel lunky and uncomfortable. But after sparring with it, its done nicely. I'm very impressed with this headgear.
customer_reviews.author: PhilipLee
